meanings.sent1: The noncaloric drink was a refreshing choice on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She chose the noncaloric option to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The noncaloric snack was so light, it felt like eating air.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and noncaloric as a sunbeam.
meanings.sent5: The noncaloric nature of the food made it guilt-free to enjoy.
